scripts.test: npm run jsdoc-generate && npm run schema-generate
scripts.jsdoc-generate: $(node -p 'path.relative(__dirname, path.dirname(require.resolve("@ui5/cli"))).startsWith("..") && process.exit(1); process.exit(0)') && npm run jsdoc-generate-local || npm run jsdoc-generate-workspace
scripts.jsdoc-generate-local: jsdoc -c ./jsdoc.json -t $(node -p 'path.dirname(require.resolve("docdash"))') ./ || (echo 'Error during JSDoc generation! Check log.' && exit 1)
scripts.jsdoc-generate-workspace: jsdoc -c ./jsdoc-workspace.json -t $(node -p 'path.dirname(require.resolve("docdash"))') ../ || (echo 'Error during JSDoc generation! Check log.' && exit 1)
